title: Riot, Ward Names Please!
body:
Wards need to be labelled better!

Currently to see who placed a specific ward, you have to...

**1. Click the ward
2. Hover mouse over tiny icon**

The mouse should be used for other things in this time.

I suggest either making it in the window shown when clicked on or even better... Make every ward display the name of the person who placed it for team-mates. Also make wards you've place a special colour on the map. Like purple dots.
